title: RIP AP Rek'Sai
body:
Today's PBE update:

>Rek'Sai
> * Queen's Wrath (Q) bonus AD ratio lowered to .3 from .4
> * Prey Seeker (Burrowed Q) AP ratio lowered to .7 AP from 1.0 AP

I guess Riot didn't really want people playing what was basically AP NIdalee with a broken arm, it made Rek'sai annoying to both teams.
